BLACK SEA.
ROMANIA.
DNC 10.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 18 FEB 18
   BY M/V FUGRO SYNERGY IN AREA BOUND BY
   43-58.3N 028-39.4E, 43-58.3N 028-49.0E,
   44-07.8N 030-38.5E, 43-52.5N 030-52.3E,
   43-47.3N 030-45.6E, 44-01.4N 030-28.0E,
   44-04.0N 030-12.1E, 44-00.7N 030-05.3E,
   43-57.2N 028-39.4E.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 19 FEB 18.
